Test: public void testSurrogatesWithRaw() throws Exception { final String VALUE = quote("\ud83d\ude0c"); ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream(); JsonGenerator jgen = JSON_F.createGenerator(out); jgen.writeStartArray(); jgen.writeRaw(VALUE); jgen.writeEndArray(); jgen.close(); final byte[] JSON = out.toByteArray(); JsonParser jp = JSON_F.createParser(JSON); String str = jp.getText(); jp.close(); }
Code: public void writeRaw(String text, int offset, int len){final char[] buf = _charBuffer;while (len > 0) {int len2 = Math.min(buf.length, len);text.getChars(offset, offset+len2, buf, 0);writeRaw(buf, -1, len2);offset += len2;;}}
